title: Papyrus Inscribed in Greek
description:
16.617r - Conclusion of a Document (7 lines) 
16.617v - Letter of Serenus (13 lines)
Fragmentary papyrus inscribed in Greek on both the recto and the verso. The recto contains seven lines of text that comprise the end of a contract now lost. The verso has twelve lines of text comprising the beginnings of a private letter. The address of the letter is written along the left margin of the recto.
dimensions:
Glass: 5 1/2 x 8 7/16 in. (14 x 21.5 cm)
Object: 3 1/8 x 5 1/2 in. (8 x 14 cm)
credit_line: Gift of Evangeline Wilbour Blashfield, Theodora Wilbour, and Victor Wilbour honoring the wishes of their mother, Charlotte Beebe Wilbour, as a memorial to their father, Charles Edwin Wilbour

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
